name: andile-m-afrika-school
description: Sophisticated School Management System for Andile M-Afrika

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd backend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm install && VITE_API_URL=/api npm run build
